description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file with a suspicious extension
name: Bitsadmin Download File with Suspicious Extension
query: (process.executable:*\\bitsadmin.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \/transfer\ * OR *\ \/create\ * OR *\ \/addfile\ *) AND process.command_line:(*.asax* OR *.ashx* OR *.asmx* OR *.asp* OR *.aspx* OR *.bat* OR *.cfm* OR *.cgi* OR *.chm* OR *.cmd* OR *.gif* OR *.jpeg* OR *.jpg* OR *.jsp* OR *.jspx* OR *.png* OR *.ps1* OR *.psm1* OR *.scf* OR *.sct* OR *.txt* OR *.vbe* OR *.vbs* OR *.war* OR *.wsf* OR *.wsh* OR *.zip* OR *.rar* OR *.dll*))
author: Florian Roth
